languages.text: "Кибелла омыта ярким, как свежая кровь, багрянцем, и он лишь пронзительнее из-за объятий непроницаемой тьмы. Но эти тяжелые тени не таят в себе зла — они бесстрастны, мрачны, строги... и неумолимо поглощают слабые вспышки иных красок".

"Kibellah is bathed in crimson as bright as fresh blood, and its sight is all the more striking in the embrace of impenetrable darkness. And yet there is no malice in these heavy shadows — they are impartial, morose, uncompromising... and ever consuming what weak flashes of other colours there may appear."
languages.original_text: "Кибелла омыта ярким, как свежая кровь, багрянцем, и он лишь пронзительнее из-за объятий непроницаемой тьмы. Но эти тяжелые тени не таят в себе зла — они бесстрастны, мрачны, строги... и неумолимо поглощают слабые вспышки иных красок".

And yet there is no malice in these heavy shadows — they are impartial, morose, uncompromising... and ever consuming what weak flashes of other colours there may appear."

And yet there is no malice in these heavy shadows — they are impartial, morose, uncompromising... and ever consuming what weak flashes of other colours there may appear."

And yet there is no malice in these heavy shadows — they are impartial, morose, uncompromising... and ever consuming what weak flashes of other colours there may appear."

And yet there is no malice in these heavy shadows — they are impartial, morose, uncompromising... and ever consuming what weak flashes of other colours there may appear."

languages.text: «Kibellah se baña en una luz tan brillante como la sangre fresca, lo que resulta más impactante cuando está rodeada de oscuridad impenetrable. Y, sin embargo, esas sombras no esconden malicia alguna. Son imparciales, sobrias y despiadadas... y consumen cualquier destello de otro color que pudiera aparecer».
languages.original_text: "Kibellah is bathed in crimson as bright as fresh blood, and its sight is all the more striking in the embrace of impenetrable darkness. And yet there is no malice in these heavy shadows — they are impartial, morose, uncompromising... and ever consuming what weak flashes of other colours there may appear."

traits.locale_text: «Kibellah se baña en una luz tan brillante como la sangre fresca, lo que resulta más impactante cuando está rodeada de oscuridad impenetrable. Y, sin embargo, esas sombras no esconden malicia alguna. Son imparciales, sobrias y despiadadas... y consumen cualquier destello de otro color que pudiera aparecer».

languages.text: 「キベラは鮮血のように鮮やかな深紅に染まっており、その姿は不可解な闇に抱かれてより際立っています。ですが、この重い影に悪意はありません。公平で、不機嫌で、妥協がなく…他の色の弱い閃光が見えたとしても、それを常に飲み込み続けているのです」
languages.original_text: "Kibellah is bathed in crimson as bright as fresh blood, and its sight is all the more striking in the embrace of impenetrable darkness. And yet there is no malice in these heavy shadows — they are impartial, morose, uncompromising... and ever consuming what weak flashes of other colours there may appear."

traits.locale_text: 「キベラは鮮血のように鮮やかな深紅に染まっており、その姿は不可解な闇に抱かれてより際立っています。ですが、この重い影に悪意はありません。公平で、不機嫌で、妥協がなく…他の色の弱い閃光が見えたとしても、それを常に飲み込み続けているのです」

languages.text: “绮贝菈沐浴在一片赤红之中，如同新鲜的血液。所有的红色色调包裹在无法穿透的黑暗之中，因此显得更加鲜艳夺目。不过，她沉重的阴影之中没有任何恶意。阴沉的颜色不偏不倚，没有任何妥协……同时在不断吸收其他颜色微弱的光芒。”
languages.original_text: "Kibellah is bathed in crimson as bright as fresh blood, and its sight is all the more striking in the embrace of impenetrable darkness. And yet there is no malice in these heavy shadows — they are impartial, morose, uncompromising... and ever consuming what weak flashes of other colours there may appear."

traits.locale_text: “绮贝菈沐浴在一片赤红之中，如同新鲜的血液。所有的红色色调包裹在无法穿透的黑暗之中，因此显得更加鲜艳夺目。不过，她沉重的阴影之中没有任何恶意。阴沉的颜色不偏不倚，没有任何妥协……同时在不断吸收其他颜色微弱的光芒。”

languages.text: "Kibellah ist in Rot getaucht so hell wie frisches Blut, und der Anblick ist umso beeindruckender, weil von undurchdringlicher Dunkelheit umgeben. Gleichzeitig liegt keinerlei Hinterlist in diesen schweren Schatten – sie sind unparteiisch, trüb, kompromisslos ... und verschlingen alle schwachen Blitze anderer Farben, sobald sie erscheinen."
languages.original_text: "Kibellah is bathed in crimson as bright as fresh blood, and its sight is all the more striking in the embrace of impenetrable darkness. And yet there is no malice in these heavy shadows — they are impartial, morose, uncompromising... and ever consuming what weak flashes of other colours there may appear."

traits.locale_text: "Kibellah ist in Rot getaucht so hell wie frisches Blut, und der Anblick ist umso beeindruckender, weil von undurchdringlicher Dunkelheit umgeben. Gleichzeitig liegt keinerlei Hinterlist in diesen schweren Schatten – sie sind unparteiisch, trüb, kompromisslos ... und verschlingen alle schwachen Blitze anderer Farben, sobald sie erscheinen."

languages.text: « Kibellah est baignée d'une teinte écarlate aussi vive que le sang frais, et sa vue est d'autant plus frappante dans l'étreinte des ténèbres impénétrables. Pourtant, si épaisses soient-elles, ces ombres ne pensent pas à mal. Elles sont impartiales, lugubres, inflexibles... et elles dévorent systématiquement les bribes d'autres couleurs susceptibles de se manifester. »
languages.original_text: "Kibellah is bathed in crimson as bright as fresh blood, and its sight is all the more striking in the embrace of impenetrable darkness. And yet there is no malice in these heavy shadows — they are impartial, morose, uncompromising... and ever consuming what weak flashes of other colours there may appear."

Elles sont impartiales, lugubres, inflexibles... et elles dévorent systématiquement les bribes d'autres couleurs susceptibles de se manifester. »

languages.text: "Kibellah, taze akmış kan kadar parlak bir kızılda yıkandı. Görüntüsüyse zifirî karanlığın karşılamasından bile daha çarpıcı. Yine de bu yoğun gölgeler melanetten yoksun. Tarafsızlar, aksiler, inatçılar... Ortaya çıkabilecek diğer renklerin zayıf ışıltılarını mütemadiyen tüketiyorlar."
languages.original_text: "Kibellah is bathed in crimson as bright as fresh blood, and its sight is all the more striking in the embrace of impenetrable darkness. And yet there is no malice in these heavy shadows — they are impartial, morose, uncompromising... and ever consuming what weak flashes of other colours there may appear."
